title: Web Development Practice Competency Enhancement: Competency-Based Mobile Leadership Education for Medical Students

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will be able to apply core medical team leadership competencies (decision-making, conflict management, change leadership) with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners will analyze leadership case studies through a 10-minute microlearning module and create action plans with at least three concrete steps.
Learners will achieve a collaboration score of at least 4 points (on a 5-point scale) in leadership simulations through peer evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
